abstract: Sanofi-Aventis is likely to make an unsolicited offer of up to $70 a share for Genzyme, raising the stakes for what could become one of the year’s biggest deal situations, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis is likely to make an unsolicited offer of up to $70 a share for Genzyme, raising the stakes for what could become one of the year’s biggest deal situations, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis is likely to make an unsolicited offer of up to $70 a share for Genzyme, raising the stakes for what could become one of the year’s biggest deal situations, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: Sanofi Is Likely to Make Offer for Genzyme

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
